author: Erin Durkin
title: Thousands of NYPD officers out sick amid coronavirus crisis
description: Not all sick officers have been tested for the coronavirus.
content:
A NYPD patrol car | AP Photo
NEW YORK  Thousands of NYPD officers have called in sick as the police department is hit with a growing number of coronavirus infections.
About 3,200 cops are out sick Wednesday, Police Commissioner Dermot Shea said triple the n… [+1184 chars]
